headline: BofA Flags Margin Uncertainty for Clorox (CLX) After Q2 Earnings Miss
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) is included among the 15 Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 4, BofA analyst Anna Lizzul raised the firm’s price target on The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) to $112 from $110 and kept a Neutral rating on the stock. The move followed the company’s fiscal Q2 results, where adjusted […]

headline: Clorox Weighs GOJO Deal And ERP Finish Against Softer Earnings
summary: Clorox (NYSE:CLX) announced a planned acquisition of GOJO Industries, the maker of Purell, aiming to expand its health and hygiene portfolio. The company also reported the completion of a major enterprise resource planning (ERP) system upgrade, marking the end of a significant internal transition. These developments come as Clorox shares trade around $117.77, with the stock up 8.2% over the past week and 16.3% over the past month. For investors watching NYSE:CLX, the GOJO deal and ERP...
